propertyDescriptions.studyDesignType: Design types that are based on the overall experimental design.
propertyDescriptions.studyOtherDesignType: If Other was selected in Design Type, list any other design types that were used in this Dataset.
propertyDescriptions.studyOtherFactorType: If Other was selected in Factor Type, list any other factor types that were used in this Dataset.
propertyDescriptions.studyAssayOrganism: The taxonomic name of the organism used in the Dataset or from which the  starting biological material derives.
propertyDescriptions.studyAssayOtherOrganism: If Other was selected in Organism, list any other organisms that were used in this Dataset. Terms from the NCBI Taxonomy are recommended.
propertyDescriptions.studyAssayMeasurementType: A term to qualify the endpoint, or what is being measured (e.g. gene expression profiling; protein identification).
propertyDescriptions.studyAssayOtherMeasurmentType: If Other was selected in Measurement Type, list any other measurement types that were used. Terms from NCBO Bioportal are recommended.
propertyDescriptions.studyAssayTechnologyType: A term to identify the technology used to perform the measurement (e.g. DNA microarray; mass spectrometry).
propertyDescriptions.studyAssayOtherTechnologyType: If Other was selected in Technology Type, list any other technology types that were used in this Dataset.
propertyDescriptions.studyAssayPlatform: The manufacturer and name of the technology platform used in the assay (e.g. Bruker AVANCE).
propertyDescriptions.studyAssayOtherPlatform: If Other was selected in Technology Platform, list any other technology platforms that were used in this Dataset.
propertyDescriptions.studyAssayCellType: The name of the cell line from which the source or sample derives.

studyAssayOtherOrganism.hunDescription: Ha a fenti mezőben az Egyéb opciót választotta, sorolja fel, mely egyéb organizmusok kerültek felhasználásra az adatcsomagban! Az NCBI taxonómiából származó kifejezések felsorolása javasolt.
